title: Cloud of Daggers
content:
Cloud of Daggers Level 2 Conjuration Spell 4~16 Damage 4d4 Slashing Conjure a cloud of spinning daggers that attack anyone inside. 10 turns 18m Concentration Action Level 2 Spell Slot

Cloud of Daggers

Level 2 Conjuration Spell

Conjure a cloud of spinning daggers that attack anyone inside.

18m Concentration

Cloud of Daggers is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Cloud of Daggers is a Lvl 2 Spell from the Conjuration school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the enviroment.

Cloud of Daggers Information

Effect: Conjure a cloud of spinning daggers that attack anyone inside. Level: Lvl 2 spell. School: Conjuration school. Casting Time: 1 Action Duration: 10 turns Range: 18m Requires Concentration: Yes Saving Throw: N/A

How to Acquire Cloud of Daggers

Cloud of Daggers can be acquired by the following classes:

Bard Sorcerer Warlock Wizard

Cloud of Daggers can be cast by using the following Items:
